item.title: Portal extension for Azure Firewall with DDoS protection
item.description: Introduction In the ever-evolving landscape of network security, Azure Firewall has emerged as a key player. As a managed, cloud-based network security service, it provides essential protection for your Azure Virtual Network resources. Cyber threats are increasingly sophisticated and frequent, the importance of robust security measures like Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) protection cannot be overstated.
